Website Changelogs

Changelogs of my website.

To get notified of the updates on this website, you can subscribe to the Leilukin's Hub RSS feed, which contains new articles, blog posts and website changelogs, or follow my Neocities profile.

Latest Changelogs

27 June 2023

  • Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic shrine:
    • Added new article: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) for My Same-Gender Romance Mods for Star Wars: Knight of the Old Republic Series.
    • Make the sidebar table of contents of Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic: Redeeming Bastila Guide sticky.
    • Fixed broken links on the navigation bar.
    • Modified footer content.
    • Removed unnecessary code in CSS.
    • Removed the background image of the shrines that was accidentally done through importing the main CSS.

26 June 2023

  • Replaced incorrect uses of semantic HTML tags throughout the entire website, such as replacing <em> that were used for media titles with <cite>, <strong> that were used for styling with custom CSS class.

23 June 2023

  • The HTML, CSS and JavaScript of entire website has been rewritten to improve the site's layout! See the June 2023 Layout Rewrite for more information!

15 June 2023

  • Removed unnecessary CSS files.
  • Refactored the index page's HTML and CSS.

11 June 2023

  • Widened the website content layout.
  • Changed the header image of my Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic shrine.

9 May 2023

  • New blog post: Onboard the Dracula Daily Hype Train.

5 May 2023

  • Modify the web application manifest of this site to make this site look more like a mobile app when added to a mobile device's home screen.

27 March 2023

  • Added my latest mod, Leilukin's Juhani's Outfit Reskin Pack, to my mods for Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic page.

23 March 2023

  • Switch the content of the left and right sidebars. Navigation links are now on the left sidebar, while the table of contents on the right sidebar.
  • Proper indentation of the HTML codes.

22 March 2023

  • Added the dates of publication of articles.

20 March 2023

  • Tweaked the format of the dates of publication and update of articles.

19 March 2023

  • Added a new masterlist on my Resources page: Anti-Harry Potter and Anti-J. K. Rowling Masterlist
  • Changed the color of subheadings.

2 March 2023

  • Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic shrine: Updated the Guides page to add a section for lists of cheats for the KotOR games.

18 February 2023

  • Added Site Map.
  • Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic shrine: Added guides:
    • Juhani Romance Guide
    • Redeeming Bastila Guide
    • Sandral-Matale Feud Ending Guide

17 February 2023

  • A Summer’s End — Hong Kong 1986 shrine:
    • Added a Trivia page.
    • Added information and link to A Summer's End's' official soundtrack on the Playlists page.
  • Added a new shrine: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.

16 February 2023

  • Added a Shrines page, with the first e-shrine on this website being A Summer’s End — Hong Kong 1986.

10 February 2023

  • Updated the banner image of my Alternate Revan Romances REDUX mod on the Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords mod page.
  • Added a Webrings section on the home page.

7 February 2023

  • Updated the Resources page to add a my Missing K1 Party Member Ports for TSL modder's resource.

31 January 2023

  • Updated the Links page as I have officially joined the Queer Coded webring.

30 January 2023

  • Added my latest mod, Juhani Item Pack for TSL, to my mods for Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords page.
